front.title: Use of the SHA3 One-way Hash Functions in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using the one-way hash functions in the SHA3 family with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS). The SHA3 family can be used as a message digest algorithm, as part of a signature algorithm, as part of a message authentication code, or part of a key derivation function.
